website_summaries.verdict: Set with stand and 600 letters is ready to use right out of the box. Versatile 10 by 10-inch square design.
pros: Popular for special occasions and classroom use
Pink and gray colors are light and whimsical for children to enjoy
Frame is made of premium American oak for a rustic look
cons: Some numbers and letters don’t have the best teeth and could fall off if not properly affixed

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service & great for photos
customer_reviews.text: My board had a stain. After contacting customer service they were more than happy to send out a replacement for me. Thank you for correcting the issue and being so quick about it! The board is made of a solid quality wood, which I was extremely impress with. It was super sturdy. It comes with black and white letter with extra symbols (smile face, heart, thumbs up), and tiny hook to twist into pre-drilled holes if you wanted to hang it up. If you want to keep it standing, it comes with a base that slides in easily. I recommend using tiny scissors to cut out the letter faster. Thanks for making my grad pics look great (attached)!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around
customer_reviews.text: Good quality board. Seems very heavy & sturdy. Bought it to announce the birth of my child, but can be used for so much more. Great customer service to top it off. The seller Richard is very prompt at communicating. Would 100% recommend this board & this seller, and will be looking into future purchases with him. I’ve seen letter boards at places like BuyBuy Baby and Target; their quality is unmatchable to this board. This is something that will last years. Plus, I love that it is double sided and can be used for both genders if using as a birth announcement, or to just have a choice of different colors for different rooms/decor. Highly recommend. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ashley theresa

customer_reviews.title: More fun than I bargained for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this letterboard with the intent of inspiring my children with inspirational quotes at home. My teenage boys had other ideas. They have commandeered the letter board (which is great quality, by the way!) and inspire us often with messages like the one pictured. Seriously - if I'd had any idea this would turn into such a fun part of my life, I'd have bought one of these a long time ago! (Of course, if you don't have teenage boys in the house, you will have to do all of the work yourself, which takes a moderate amount of time.)
customer_reviews.author: Brigette

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful!!! Great Quality. Used this for my birth announcement and it did not disappoint! The letters and board are very sturdy. When I first received this board, I had an issue and complained to customer service. They responded very fast and solved my problem instantly. I am very pleased and recommend this letter board!
customer_reviews.author: AddyDos

customer_reviews.title: Cute color green and gray
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality but not sure why it comes with some white letters missing. Contact Amazon but they said there is no partial replacement. They can do replacement for the whole thing but I don’t want to spend too much time to ship everything back for a full replacement. I’ll keep it since it is cute and very functional. I like both side (green and gray). It works good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stand is the best part!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the idea of owning a letter board, but I got pretty picky rather quickly considering how many sellers are in this particular market. The deal breakers for me were the wooden stand it comes with and the fact that it is double sided with different colors. Although it is a bit of a pain to break apart all the letters, you can pull them apart as you need to.There are a vast amount of letters, symbols and other characters I wouldn't have even imagined. Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: amazontoni

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth on purchasing this because of the price. The reviews were great and it is 2 boards for the price of 1. Worth every single penny. I got the grey and pink which came with white and black letters. The stand is also really sturdy. The letters are easy to pop out. Wish the bag for the letters was a little bigger and there were more emojis (an exclamation point would be useful). Overall quit reading reviews and buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at quite a few letter boards before I chose this one. Ultimately, I thought I'd get more use out of it because it is double sided. So far, I absolutely love it and I can't wait to get tons of use out of it. I will be using it in my photo shoots for an extra level of personalization. I also plan to paint the wood just because it looks a little unfinished as is, for my personal taste. The letters seem to be of great quality, though I do recommend cutting them off instead of spending hours trying to rip each one from the plastic holders. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cute inspirational board for any home or desk!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived promptly yesterday and I couldn't be more pleased with it. It arrived in a nice looking box (so could have easily been a present), and was even better quality than it looked in the photos. I love the wooden frame and stand and the fact that it is 2 sided. The letters stick on it perfectly and it makes such a cute entry way addition where we can write happy quotes or messages that we can see as we leave the house and again as we come back home. :) Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Can be used on the wall! Super cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is double sided, especially with pink. I plan on using it for monthly updates for my baby girl when she arrives. But for now it’s hanging on my living room wall. I did not use the eye hooks that came with it to hang. I wanted to easily remove it from the wall without the hanging mechanism being visible, so I just used a small nail in the wall and let it hang! It’s been a hit at my house!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! (A little small)
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems very good. I’m very excited about this gift! This is a pretty good price for a double-sided board that comes with this many letters. I would note that it’s a little smaller than I imagined. I would say closer to the size of an iPad than the size of a textbook. Still, it will make a nice decorative piece.
customer_reviews.author: Janmaris

customer_reviews.title: I don't often write reviews, because I only order ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, because I only order what I want and expect it to be what I pay for. But this thing is my new obsession! It's so well made! These letters (which I cut off the brackets with a scissor) all stick in the felt. The piece is solid! The white felt is crisp, and no discoloration at all. If you're going to buy one of these... it should be this one!
customer_reviews.author: Natascha

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL, QUALITY PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this product to 2 people this Christmas, and we were all thrilled with the quality! If you are gifting this product, do the person receiving this product a favor: Cut the letters for them! I used a pair of side cutters, and in 45 minutes, I had all of the letters/symbols off! I am impressed with this product! Would recommend to others, and I may even purchase one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie F.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This board is made really well, very good quality wood, and the fact that is double sided makes it great and versatile. The packaging is great, the bag to keep the letters is made very well too, and the price is also very reasonable. I recomend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful letter board. Don’t hesitate to purchase this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this double sided letter board. I got it to use for our family pictures to announce our baby to family and friend. It is exactly what I was looking for and can’t wait to use it! I love that it is grey on one side and black on the other with both white and black letters and symbols to really help personalize the board! It was so easy to use and get creative with. The wooden stand is also a good addition to the board! Excellent quality and great customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Pleviak

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my new livvy creation letterboard
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new livvy creation letterboard. It’s double sided, comes with a ton of letter, and it’s so cute! I’ve been wanting a letter board for awhile but couldn’t commit to spending the money (they’re expensive on Etsy) then I found this one!! I was so excited and even more excited when I received my letter board and it was such high quality! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Robin Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: The dusty pink/blush side is exactly the shade of my pink spring decor. I love this sign. Changing the sayings has never really been fun for me, but I think the pay off is worth it! I can’t wait to use the gray side during fall!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product - Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We are using this every day, really fun for our family. The board is cool and these guys are awesome (good customer service, personally followed up after the order etc.). The frame is really solid and well made and fits perfectly in the block stand. This is actually a gift for my wife, so I love that it came in a really nice looking box. Thanks guys quality product and awesome service.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this product is just so well made, so versatile and WELL worth the affordable price. Having the double sided option is such a game changer. And the wood stand really makes the sign look very high end. Even the little satchel it comes with to put all the letters in is lovely. I bought this in preparation for my baby coming and let me tell you, this mama is completely delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. First it has two sides a gray and a pink (which you could use for boy and girl), second it has 2 sets of letters, symbols and emoticons (black and white), lastly it is very sturdy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This is one heavy duty letter board. The quality is so good, I am surprised. I love that it's reversible and comes with 2 color letters. Can not recommend this any more. Great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for and it came in two colours !!
customer_reviews.text: This the board I have been looking for. Love the fact that it has two sides with different colours, yay! Options. You can make as many words as you want and you never fall short of alphabets, has a lot of repeat alphabets, which us amazing. Their customer service is top notch, I got few letters, that were broken and received a new board in couple of days, highly highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Supriya

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This two-sided two-color board is just so pretty. Just the right size for an inspirational quote or saying. Love the stand, better than an easel. Lots of possibilities here. Used the words from another item selling on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I love the option of using either white or black as my background and having a stand to go with my board. Everything is so well made and arrived perfectly packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for my pregnancy update photos and I love it. I also ended up using it for my daughter's birthday pictures. The quality is great and I love that I can change between both sides. I plan on continuing to use it once baby is born!
customer_reviews.author: Andrina Mills

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. It is strong sturdy material. The felt on each side is in great condition and the stand works well. There is a ton of letters and will work perfect for my baby announcement.
customer_reviews.author: April D.

customer_reviews.title: the letters easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These boards are well made, the letters easy to use, and the shipment got to me quickly. I was soooo pleasantly surprised to find great-quality products that were double sided for such a great price. Note that there is a set of white letters and black letters and a stand, which I did not originally notice. I am using them as staff gifts and know that everyone will just love them!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Basey Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because the reviews were so good but it even exceeded my expectation. It’s good quality, I love the double sided feature, and it comes with a stand (most didn’t seem to). It even came with a nice cloth coin bag to put all of your letters and symbols in! My husband and I can’t wait to use it for our baby announcement and then after!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Brayton

customer_reviews.title: Double Duty!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my decorating needs! I love the fact that you can use BOTH sides :)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this letter board
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this letter board!! I bought it based on it being two sided, having a display stand, 5 star reviews and product feature description. It’s exactly as described. I would definitely purchase from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I love that it's double-sided and comes with black and white letters and a bunch of symbols. This now has a permanent place on my desk :) Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ashley

customer_reviews.title: beats out the competition!
customer_reviews.text: So great! I love that it was the same price point as its competitors, but the only one to offer two sides. Great for a small business, blogging, social media, parties, etc. Would definitely purchase from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Ali Bateman (Troost)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! Extremely high quality that exceeded my expectations! I would 100% buy this again. Tip: wire cutters work great to separate plastic letters!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby B

customer_reviews.title: I love having 2 colors on one board
customer_reviews.text: I love having 2 colors on one board. The extra letters allow for different messages on both sides. It feels sturdy/well-made. For example, it has nice corner joints and rubber pads on the base which protect the surface the board sits on and acts as a good grip. So clever! This will make a great gift for one of my friends come birthday time.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The stand it comes with is perfect too. Very well made, sturdy and nice letters.
customer_reviews.author: E Tevis

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Good product, however it is extremely annoying that all the letters have to be individually cutout. I would avoid recommending this to anyone for that reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Pellberg

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can switch to black or gray
customer_reviews.text: I had originally purchased a felt letter board before this one for almost $40 until this one came out in my suggestions, I decided to return the previous one and bought this one instead... I love that you can switch to black or gray... and the price is pretty good compared to other shops.
customer_reviews.author: Marianella

customer_reviews.title: Well made and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase this board because I was undecided if I wanted a black or white board for our pregnancy announcement. Let me tell you, it's awesome! It's well made, has so many letters/symbols/emojis, and I love that it has a stand! I plan on using it as a monthly photo shoot prop once the babe is here as well. Can't beat the price of two boards for the cost of one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Super dooper felt letter board!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this! Really really like that it's double sided! Well worth the money! Top Quality! Packaged very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the double sided. I’ve used both already multiples times. I’ve been using to track my pregnancy weeks, make our baby announcements, and will use when baby girl is here. Absolutely love, makes for great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dhiqvajspansh

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to use for our baby shower and later to announce birth of our baby and I love it has two sides to use! Also comes with plenty of letters and symbols in both white and black!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Small but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Remember to check the letters size. It is small and you need to be very close to board to read it. Otherwise it's a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Really good letter board
customer_reviews.text: Great board, the only drawback is letters only have one post so they are not super sturdy. loved the additional characters & emoji's though!
customer_reviews.author: Niki C.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a friend, but now I want one for myself. I love how you have 2 options for background colors. The stand is also a great selling point, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Removing letters was a bit of a pain, otherwise great product. Lots of letters and symbols. Just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Came with lots of letters and emojis ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Came with lots of letters and emojis to pick from. You do have to separate the letters yourself, but I have read the same of other products as well. Love that it is double sided! Can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: Fun letter board
customer_reviews.text: Works great for announcements or just fun messaging. Each side is a different color. Big selections of letters, numbers and characters.
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: Twice the board for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a letter board for awhile and love that it is two sided for a great price. I'm loving it on my mantle and look forward to using the pink side as well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: So fun and practical
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal. Comes with everything you need to get started without over committing. Love using the board!
customer_reviews.author: Christina C

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality of the board and letters
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of the board and letters. Pleasantly surprised to receive letters in both black and white. I highly recommend this product if you are looking for a double sided pink and gray letter board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This board was very adorable and exactly as described! The stand is also a very nice touch! I can’t wait to use it in my daughters nursery!
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different letters. Good quality. I see so many of these and they are made so cheap. This was a Good Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Used this board for newborn photos with our daughter’s birth information on it. Worked great! Also like the fact that the back is a grey side that can be used as well, for example if we happen to have a boy sometime down the road then we won’t need to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: MPAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options
customer_reviews.text: Used this for first day of school pictures. There were so many letters and emojies to choose from. I love that it has a front and back, and holder so I can also use it to put on display in my kids rooms. There are also fasteners if you want to hang it. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality letter board at a great price! Love that it is reversible!
customer_reviews.author: allieg

customer_reviews.title: Great board, letters are hard to cut.
customer_reviews.text: The letter board is amazing! I absolutely love that it's double sided. My only issue was removing the letters when opening the package, I had a few that broke, even while using scissors. Also wish it came with more than one pouch to separate letters better. Overall great product, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I love my letter board
customer_reviews.text: I love my letter board! The fact that it is double sided made the decision of which color to purchase so much easier! The board solidly stands upright and the felt looks classy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It was exactly what I was looking for and more. I love that it's double sided and provides two different colors. This gives me the ability to mix and match for variety and really gives you a bang for your buck! Also, I love that it comes with PLENTY of letters as well as a little pouch to hold them all! I would totally recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our maternity pictures, and plan on using for newborn photos!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved. Added character to our announcement pics! Plenty of letters and extras.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Scott-Budd

customer_reviews.title: This letter board was awesome! I love that you can use both sides ...
customer_reviews.text: This letter board was awesome! I love that you can use both sides and have two color options. And you get black and white letters too! We used this for our wedding (hashtag sign) and it worked perfectly. But now I have it in our house and it’s one of my favorite parts of our decor. It comes with a stand which is awesome. I would definitely recommend this letterboard if you’re looking for one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love that this felt board is two sided and is made with great quality! Super fast shipping too thanks to Prime! Came with all the letters I need to make beautiful boards!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Greene

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but the quality is very cheap..wouldn't order again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: WAY better quality than I expected, absolutely stunning! I purchased it to use for my son (gray side) and daughter (pink side). Very well made and packaged perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Such great quality! Wood is sturdy and beautiful. Felt board is thick and holds letters well. Large variety of letters.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Best felt letter board ever
customer_reviews.text: This felt board is AMAZING!! The quality is really impressive, has pink AND grey sides, comes with a stand, hooks to hang the board and so many letters in both black and white. We will use this for our baby girl when we announce her gender and name on social media and then in her nursery. :) so excited to have found this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged my dresser
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it less I would. This thing stained my $2000 dresser. Nothing is worth having if it is going to damage my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Pierce

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: the color is so pretty, plenty of letters and symbols. definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Erin Stone

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This board is adorable and I love that it’s double sided for double the messages. I’m recommending it to all my friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect + durable.
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome. Heavy duty and durable. Wish it came in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one is absolutely perfect because it combines the two colors I love
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a felt letterboard in pink, but kept hesitating because I knew I would want a different color for some things. This one is absolutely perfect because it combines the two colors I love! The quality is great and it comes well packaged. It has a ton of letters and symbols and even comes with a stand! I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: mrsonthemove

customer_reviews.title: Fun and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! You need dedicate a little time to breaking the letters off from the plastic holders but totally worth the end result. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! Having both colors is awesome. Works well, and looks really nice. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Might not be exactly what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality. Product images, description, and name stated it was black and white, but it arrived black and grey double sided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made board. The quality is great! I am recommending this to all of my friends. I am even thinking of buying another one...lol
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Great quality, tons of letters, and a cute little baggy to hold all the loose letters. And it comes with black and white letters. So worth the cost!!! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this board! I love that I can change up the black and gray by just turning it around!!!
customer_reviews.author: robert packer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase from them again. It came exactly as pictured and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Colors
customer_reviews.text: I love my new letter board. It is beautiful, and the matching stand is very nice. My favorite thing is that it is reversible.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Foote

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, quality customer service
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the wonderful product and above and beyond customer service! Our baby announcement photos came out exactly how we hoped!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the letter board
customer_reviews.text: Love the letter board! The letters are kind of a pain to break apart, but other than that it's pretty cool!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Having two sides is awesome! The color came out great
customer_reviews.author: Pecson

customer_reviews.title: This letterboard is made very well and I love the fact it’s double sided
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a felt letterboard look no further. This letterboard is made very well and I love the fact it’s double sided. It’s the first I’ve seen with two different colored sides and an abundance of letters and characters. The company was great so work with. Highly Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This board is great quality. It’s an awesome decoration in my home and of course pictures.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn590

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this product! Perfect for what we wanted it for! I like the option of the black and white.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the board and all the letters that came with it. Good quality and it's going to work great with my photo shoots!
customer_reviews.author: Jo W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and versatility
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good quality, feels very sturdy. Wood is nice medium tone, not yellow/orange at all. Love the versatility of two sides and two sets of letters. Plenty of letters to write all sorts of messages. Very nice to have the stand so it sits in table tops.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this letter board! High quality, tons of letters and super nice having two color options!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. It's made well. Extremely happy that I bought it. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It looks so sophisticated. I love it! Gonna have so much with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Letters and Perfect shade of Pink.
customer_reviews.text: I love the board, I use it at work and I have received multiple compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: J Yau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! High quality. Great for photos and decorating.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Schlosser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and we love the colors for our baby girl’s nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This letter board is too cute. It is a great price, nice quality, and I love that it’s double sided. I used command strips to put mine on my wall but it came with a stand too if you want. It’s a nice size too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This letter board is amazing quality! I also love that it is double sided! I bought a $20 letter board from a different company and it's not near as good quality! So this letter board is above and beyond worth $16 more!! Incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Perry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! Opened the box and it’s a lot more than I expected and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: The letters stick into the felt great and it’s a high quality product without costing much
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s two sided, the letters easily twist off and they give you a pouch for them. It also comes with its own stand which is great. The size is perfect too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Boehme

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This board is super cute and sturdy. We hung ours on the wall easily and the letters separated easily with a scissor.
customer_reviews.author: douggie ham

customer_reviews.title: I love the bird
customer_reviews.text: I love the bird, it’s 2 in 1. Great quality too!! I highly recommend it if you are looking for a small feltboard.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Must have in your home!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite decor in my house. I have gotten so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

product_meta.title: Felt Letter Board Pink and Gray Double Sided with Stand and 600 Letters. 10x10 American Oak Wood Changeable Message Board. Pregnancy Baby Announcement Sign.
product_meta.description: Please note: A letter board is not designed to be a children’s toy, please use appropriately.
feature_bullets: SUPER STUNNING LIGHT PINK AND GRAY! We carefully selected the perfect tones of pink & grey to make the most beautiful board. It’s double sided, giving you many more options than a regular single sided 10x10 letter board. The Livvy Creations changeable letter board is Handmade from Premium American Oak, not pine wood, not machine made! It’s sturdy, stylish & finished with wax oil for that natural, rustic & imperfect look, it will last years. Need proof? Just look at our photos :)

UNIQUE BLOCK STAND AND HANGING HOOKS – stylish letter board with stand, uniquely designed for a double sided letter board. It’s sturdy and allows you to sit your word board on any surface, giving you many more options to display your messages and signs around your home, office or business! You will simply love it. It also comes with two hanging hooks making your alphabet board wall mountable, it’s wall art when combined with your favorite string or wire. So much fun awaits!

DOUBLE THE CHARACTERS IN WHITE AND BLACK - Over 600 letters, numbers, symbols and emojis. You told us that having just 1 set of characters wasn’t enough because you’d like to create all kinds of messages, so we doubled them! Now you can change your message whenever you want and not worry whether you’ll have the letters to do it! It gives you so much versatility for home and business - home & kitchen pink decor, business & shop window signage and more!

PERFECT ANNOUNCEMENT BOARD - Anyone can create funny, inspirational quotes and personalized messages for all special occasions & milestones – birthdays, engagement, anniversary, wedding, baby shower gift, it makes a great gender reveal sign, new baby boy or girl announcement board, pregnancy announcement or even a dog announcement idea! There are endless DIY possibilities with this reversible pink letter board gray!

THE LIVVY CREATIONS 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – Your grey and pink felt letter board with letters comes beautifully packaged for gift giving, we love it & we are sure you will too! If you don’t, simply let us know within 30 days & we will refund your order, no questions asked. That’s the Livvy Creations promise. Buy risk-free today.
